resume_text:
NAME: Henry Martinez
EMAIL: henry.martinez@email.com
PHONE: (555) 789-3456

SUMMARY:
Product Manager with 6 years experience in driving product vision, strategy, and execution within agile software development environments.

SKILLS:
Agile, Scrum, Product Roadmapping, Market Analysis, User Research, Data Analysis

EXPERIENCE:
Tech Products Corp - Product Manager (2019 - Present)
- Define and execute product roadmap based on market research and user feedback.
- Lead cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products on time and within budget.

Software Solutions Inc - Business Analyst (2017 - 2019)
- Gathered and documented business requirements for software development projects.
- Conducted user research and market analysis to inform product decisions.

EDUCATION:
University of Michigan - MBA (2017)

CERTIFICATIONS:
Certified Scrum Master
